settings.shortIntroduction:
Murug Turug, also known as the Heaven of Waterfalls, is an award winning tourism site - Sabah Tourism Award 2019 - Best community-Based Tourism Initiative (Rural).

Located 11km off Tamparuli Sabah, it has attracted thousands of visitors from all around the world since its opening.
settings.landingPageNotice:
Terms & Conditions
Note:
- There is a daily admission total quota.
- To avoid full visitor admission quota, it is advisable to book 3 days before actual day of hiking.
- Hiking activities is at your own risk.
Additional Participants (pax):
- ğŸ“Œ If you wish to bring additional participants, they must also be booked in advance through our website. Walk-ins for additional participants will not be permitted, as we require advance notice to ensure all necessary preparations are made for a safe and enjoyable experience.
Cancellation Policy
- ğŸ“Œ REFUND Payment is only possible if your TEAM withdraws 72 hours before hiking / MTET informs the Weather that it is not suitable for hiking / or any Emergency alert from the MTET.
settings.shortIntroductionBm:
Murug Turug, juga dikenali sebagai "the Heaven of Waterfalls", merupakan kawasan pelancongan yang dianugerah Sabah Tourism Award 2019 - Best community-Based Tourism Initiative (Rural).

Berada di km 11 Tamparuli Sabah, ia telah menarik ribuan pelancong dari seluruh dunia sejak pembukaan.
settings.landingPageNoticeBm:
Terma dan Syarat
Nota:
- Ada had jumlah tetamu yang dibenarkan untuk setiap hari.
- Sila booking paling lewat 3 hari sebelum datang supaya ada slot untuk anda.
- Activiti mendaki ada risikonya dan anda bertanggungjawab atas keselamatan diri sendiri.
Peserta Tambahan (pax):
- ğŸ“Œ Jika anda ingin membawa peserta tambahan, mereka juga mesti ditempah lebih awal melalui laman web kami. Walk-in untuk peserta tambahan tidak akan dibenarkan kerana kami memerlukan pemberitahuan awal untuk memastikan semua persiapan yang diperlukan dilakukan bagi menjamin pengalaman yang selamat dan menyeronokkan.
Polisi Pembatalan
- ğŸ“Œ REFUND hanya akan diproses jika kumpulan anda batal 72 jam sebelum hiking / jika MTET memberitahu keadaan cuaca yang teruk / apa-apa perkara emergency dari MTET

activityData.title: Pakej A
activityData.shortItemDetails: A short hike directly to the main waterfalls.
activityData.shortItemDetailsBm: Hiking terus pergi air terjun yang utama.
activityData.details: âœ”ï¸ 1 Waterfall,âœ”ï¸ Murug-Turug Waterfall,âœ”ï¸ Conservation Fee,Level: Easy,Total Distance: 3km(return trail),Registration open 730am,All hikers are allowed to stay at waterfall area until 4pm only,All hikers must leave waterfall site before 4pm,All hikers must reach back to check point before 5pm,Extra fee for guide if over 5pm is needed at rm15/hour,4x4 Grab transportation is available if needed for 1.3km but you will still need to hike around 300meters to reach waterfall
activityData.detailsBm: âœ”ï¸ 1 Air Terjun, âœ”ï¸ Air Terjun Murug-Turug, âœ”ï¸ Yuran Konservasi, Tahap: Mudah, Jarak Total: 3km (pulang-balik), Pendaftaran dibuka pada 7:30 pagi, Semua pendaki dibenarkan tinggal di kawasan air terjun sehingga 4 petang sahaja, Semua pendaki mesti meninggalkan tapak air terjun sebelum pukul 4 petang, Semua pendaki mesti kembali ke pondok pendaftaran sebelum pukul 5 petang, Bayaran tambahan untuk guide jika melebihi pukul 5 petang adalah RM15/sejam, Pengangkutan 4x4 Grab disediakan jika diperlukan untuk 1.3km tetapi anda masih perlu mendaki kira-kira 300 meter untuk sampai ke air terjun.

activityData.title: Pakej B
activityData.shortItemDetails: An intermediate hike to 3 main waterfalls.
activityData.shortItemDetailsBm: Hiking tahap sederhana ke 3 air terjun.
activityData.details: âœ”ï¸ 3 Waterfall,âœ”ï¸ Kionop Waterfall,âœ”ï¸ Piolungan Waterfall,âœ”ï¸ Murug-Turug Waterfall,âœ”ï¸ Conservation Fee,Level: Moderate,Total Distance: 4km(semi loop trail),Registration open 730am,All hikers are allowed to stay at the last waterfall area until 4pm only,All hikers must leave the last waterfall site before 4pm,All hikers must reach back to check point before 5pm,Extra fee for guide if over 5pm is needed at rm15/hour,4x4 Grab transportation is available if needed for 1.8km but you will still need to hike around 200meters to reach the first waterfall
activityData.detailsBm: âœ”ï¸ 3 Air Terjun, âœ”ï¸ Air Terjun Kionop, âœ”ï¸ Air Terjun Piolungan, âœ”ï¸ Air Terjun Murug-Turug, âœ”ï¸ Yuran Konservasi, Tahap: Sederhana, Jarak Total: 4km (laluan setengah lingkaran), Pendaftaran dibuka pada 7:30 pagi, Semua pendaki dibenarkan berada di kawasan air terjun terakhir sehingga 4 petang sahaja, Semua pendaki mesti meninggalkan tapak air terjun terakhir sebelum pukul 4 petang, Semua pendaki mesti kembali ke pondok pendaftaran sebelum pukul 5 petang, Bayaran tambahan untuk guide jika melebihi pukul 5 petang adalah RM15/sejam, Pengangkutan 4x4 Grab disediakan jika diperlukan untuk 1.8km, tetapi anda masih perlu mendaki kira-kira 200 meter untuk mencapai air terjun pertama.

activityData.title: Pakej C
activityData.shortItemDetails: An advanced trail for covering 6 waterfalls.
activityData.shortItemDetailsBm: Hiking yang tahap susah dan merangkumi 6 air terjun.
activityData.details: Full Trail,Level: Advanced,Total Distance: 6.8km(loop trail),Not recommended for beginner hiker,Estimated 4-6 hours to complete,All hikers must reach back to check point before 5pm,Extra fee for guide if over 5pm is needed at rm15/hour
activityData.detailsBm: Laluan Penuh, Tahap: Lanjutan, Jarak Total: 6.8km (laluan pusingan), Tidak disarankan untuk pendaki beginner, Anggaran masa 4-6 jam untuk diselesaikan, Semua pendaki mesti kembali ke pondok pendaftaran sebelum pukul 5 petang, Bayaran tambahan untuk guide jika melebihi pukul 5 petang adalah RM15/sejam.

information.How To Book:
Booking your spot with Murug Turug is a straightforward 3-step process:


(1) Reserve Your Spot
Visit MurugTurug.com to check availability and pricing. Complete the contact information section to place your booking.

arrowDown(2) Make Payment
Transfer the required amount to the bank account displayed on your screen. You may use any bank that is convenient for you.
arrowDown(3) Submit Payment Proof
Upload your payment proof at MurugTurug.com/payment.

âœ… Success! It's that simple.

Note:
You must complete all steps within 30 minutes, or you will need to start over.

Note for Mac/iOS user:
This app works best in the Chrome browser.
information.Location:
ğŸ“Œ Location: Kg Minangkob Tamparuli, sabah
ğŸ“Œ Distance: Approximately 11KM from Tamparuli Town
ğŸ“Œ Otw Jalan Tamparuli -> Ranau
information.Arrival Time:
Package A & Package B: Jam 7:30 AM (Please notify admin if late)
Package C: Jam 7am
Package Ultra: Jam 7am
ğŸ•Camping Package 1: 8:00 AM TO 12:00 AM
â›º Camping Package 2: 1:00 pm- 3.00 pm

information.Camping:
For camping / overnight package, please contact us at 0193173477 or 0166671057

Untuk camping / bermalam, sila hubungi kita di 0193173477 atau 0166671057

information.Walk in Customer: Walk in is not encouraged, but if you do, please contact us for available slots at 0193173477 or 0166671057
information.Payment:
ğŸ“Œ After booking, you will receive an email with Bank Account
ğŸ“Œ Please proceed according to instruction in email
ğŸ“Œ Please pay full amount, and stating your booking REF on receipt.
ğŸ“Œ The full payment should pay to MAYBANK account 560232166965 Murug Turug Eco Tourism
ğŸ“Œ Payment receipts must be kept and submitted at murugturug.com/payment upon registration. A copy of the receipt can go directly to whatsapp to the Admin section.
ğŸ“Œ Booking will be processed once full payment has been made.
information.Refund:
ğŸ“Œ If the hiking team withdraws after the deposit is made, the deposit will not be refunded.
ğŸ“Œ REFUND Payment is only made if your TEAM withdraws two days before hiking / MTET informs the Weather that it is not suitable for hiking / or any Emergency alert from the MTET.
information.Pet: ğŸ“Œ It is NOT ALLOWED to carry a PET
information.Reminder:
ALWAYS REMEMBER
1. appropriate hiking attire
2. Suitable shoes (wet / hiking / rocky)
3. Medications that are considered necessary
4. Supplements
5. Rain Shirts (if dont wants to shower / get wet). "Adidas kampung" shoes are recommended
6. Participants are expected to return to the starting point before 5 pm; any delay will incur an additional fee to compensate for the guide's overtime.

At least info admin 3 days prior to booking, need a certificate OR foods so that the Murug - Turug Eco Tourism team can take action and set up early.
If you would like to book a T-shirt, please contact the management at www.wasap.my/60166671057 in advance (one week before) to print.

#Do not cut / trim / damage any plant throughout the area ..
#Please like / share our page . Thank you.
